# `between`

### Parameters

Name | Type | Default | Description
---- | ---- | ------- | -----------
`value` | number |  |The value to test.
`lower` | number |  |The lower bound of the range.
`upper` | number |  |The upper bound of the range.


### Description

The value to test.
